e8ec44f1-4d13-4bd4-b713-16406ce7f62e.name: 战斗反射
e8ec44f1-4d13-4bd4-b713-16406ce7f62e.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

a561645c-d81f-4439-817a-29fbbb6546d7.name: 无所惊扰
a561645c-d81f-4439-817a-29fbbb6546d7.notes: 你不用投恐惧检定，反应修正值对于你来说也几乎无效。

7c8dc32b-ad2d-4668-abfd-97ed5776fcd1.name: 幸运
7c8dc32b-ad2d-4668-abfd-97ed5776fcd1.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

7f89df42-909b-4ab7-bb5a-4ade82116b41.name: 魔法抗性 Magic Resistance
7f89df42-909b-4ab7-bb5a-4ade82116b41.notes: -1/level to skill for others to cast a spell on you. +1/level to resist spells.

bbbd5bab-0c32-4fd4-bca2-8976a5bee7b1.name: 专心致志
bbbd5bab-0c32-4fd4-bca2-8976a5bee7b1.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

6b878f3b-f9a2-4f46-b0eb-9a43095033e5.name: 视力不良（远视）
6b878f3b-f9a2-4f46-b0eb-9a43095033e5.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

f9d1a31f-4196-4433-8132-fd201f85d74f.name: 视力不良（近视）
f9d1a31f-4196-4433-8132-fd201f85d74f.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

c5301728-dc9d-4999-a47b-3c901a0ff7f6.name: 冲动
c5301728-dc9d-4999-a47b-3c901a0ff7f6.notes: 当正确的选择是等待并思考的时候，进行一次自控检定。如果失败，你必须行动起来

4a005f57-1930-4f5d-824f-d5652c596da5.name: 自负
4a005f57-1930-4f5d-824f-d5652c596da5.notes: 如果 GM 认为人物过于谨慎，可能要求人物进行自我控制检定，如果检定失败，人物不再畏缩不前，就像你能解决问题一样！

features.situation: 来自年青幼稚的人，他们相信你的吹牛

96e7ad5f-5302-44ed-9d12-811c286d7b95.name: 心不在焉
96e7ad5f-5302-44ed-9d12-811c286d7b95.notes: -5 on all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on. Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury.

d5f2b0b6-5353-425f-831d-7fd1a2960959.name: 古道热肠
d5f2b0b6-5353-425f-831d-7fd1a2960959.notes: 当你可以伸以援手或是提出帮助而又不适合这么做时，进行一次自控检定

dc104f20-4453-409b-a826-4a5ea840e19e.name: 不善掩饰
dc104f20-4453-409b-a826-4a5ea840e19e.notes: Gives others +4 on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words. They also get +4 to their IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff.

29656f97-6abe-4a44-8b90-abd2cb49a95c.name: 暴食
29656f97-6abe-4a44-8b90-abd2cb49a95c.notes: 面对丰盛的酒宴时，你需要进行自我控制检定来决定能否抵制住食物的诱惑。如果检定失败，你将不顾后果地大吃大喝。

923c95c1-68e8-487d-9a24-8992c72f79ea.name: 贪婪
923c95c1-68e8-487d-9a24-8992c72f79ea.notes: 面对任何时候提供的财富——如，工作后的报酬、冒险所得、犯罪的脏物或者作为诱饵的金钱，你需要进行自控检定。如果检定失败，你将尽一切手段得到那笔财富。

633299f3-6530-4bd0-85fa-30a03ef6677b.name: 遵纪守法
633299f3-6530-4bd0-85fa-30a03ef6677b.notes: 当你“必须”违反无意义的法规的时候，你必须进行一次自控检定；如果你失败了，你必须遵守这条法律，不论后果如何。如果你成功地抵挡了你的守法冲动违法了，在事后进行第二次自控检定，如果失败，你就必须向权力机构自首！

af1557e1-0377-4c46-8195-7c393f2b8ab9.name: 需要独处
af1557e1-0377-4c46-8195-7c393f2b8ab9.notes: 当有人在旁边晃来晃去、站在你身后俯视你等事情发生时，你需要进行自控检定。如果你失败，你会对那个人发脾气，如同你具有坏脾气劣势。

727b41d6-4e2a-4f75-b209-6876c640726f.name: 低痛阈
727b41d6-4e2a-4f75-b209-6876c640726f.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

c9976f13-610b-4540-bba4-f50ad6bcdb9d.name: 阵后战栗
c9976f13-610b-4540-bba4-f50ad6bcdb9d.notes: 每次战斗结束时投自控骰。自控检定失败后，记录失败度，投 3d+ 自控检定失败度，查恐惧检定表得出结果。

a1b09f9a-fd62-4457-b0bc-fe6a7817539f.name: 轻度腼腆
a1b09f9a-fd62-4457-b0bc-fe6a7817539f.notes: 陌生人，特别是那些敢于表达或是漂亮的陌生人，让你感到不自在。

5b59e78b-ace8-4d00-8651-ce1e4c42f589.name: 重度腼腆
5b59e78b-ace8-4d00-8651-ce1e4c42f589.notes: 你在陌生人身边感到非常不舒服，即使在朋友面前也很少说话。

f705f5df-7352-4646-9224-e58f523db4e6.name: 残疾腼腆
f705f5df-7352-4646-9224-e58f523db4e6.notes: 你尽力避免于陌生人见面。

ba8b8a2e-3ae5-4dda-b58a-2ac0a0053260.name: 作死能手
ba8b8a2e-3ae5-4dda-b58a-2ac0a0053260.notes: 每天进行一次自控检定。如果你失败了，你必须尝试戏弄一个危险的目标：熟练的战士、危险的怪物、一群能力足够的对手，等等。如果你抵抗住了冲动，你的这个自控获得累加的 -1 减值，直到你某次自控失败为止！

0a0d1b85-ce50-4ec6-8081-f2bd1d97ffe6.name: One at 8 points, two at 4 points, the rest at 1 point

e722dfd2-a1cf-4d5c-aec5-0b66ebf45e2f.name: 2 more points in a Know Thy Enemy skill
